title: freeTrash
content:
Simply reply to this email with your credit card details and you'll get a free brick delivered right to your doorstep! 
*General terms and conditions apply. 
Minimum contract term:
24 months

title: TestInquiry
content: This is the tutorial inquiry, click the info button to accept it.

title: TestInquiry
content: A debug inquiry about a dedicated server. I don't think this should exist in the final game!

title: New 2-in-1 PSU
content:
S-C-A-M Co. has now released a new generation of 2-in-1 PSUs which combine 2 genius functions into one device. 
When you buy one of our PSUs you now also get the free firestarter™ function, which will certainly light up your mood!

title: 1-for-2
content: We are selling the finest STUFF™ in the world! If you pay for 2 STUFF™, we will ship 1 to your home address!

title: Bulk Paperclips
content:
Buy industrial-grade paperclips in packs of 10,000.
Perfect for offices, datacenters, and advanced cable management.
Unsubscribe instructions available upon request.

title: Cloud Expo 20XX
content:
You are invited to attend Cloud Expo 20XX.
Early-bird tickets available now.
This email was sent to a purchased mailing list.

title: Rack-Mountable Coffee
content:
Tired of cold coffee?
Our new 19-inch rack-mount coffee machine integrates directly into your server rack.
Power draw: unspecified.

title: Increase Productivity Instantly
content:
Studies show that reading productivity newsletters increases perceived efficiency by up to 12%.
Subscribe to receive weekly insights.

title: Leftover Domains 4 Sale
content:
Premium domain names that almost make sense.
Examples: cloudsynergy.biz, hyperscale-now.net
First come, first served.

title: Data Center Feng Shui
content:
Optimize airflow, latency, and karma.
Our consultants align your racks for maximum positive energy.
Remote sessions available.

title: New Compliance Standard Released
content:
Introducing ISO/IEC 27099++.
Nobody is certified yet, but you should start preparing immediately.

title: Mystery Hardware Pallet
content:
We are auctioning a pallet of untested enterprise hardware.
Could be cables.
Could be printers.
No refunds.

title: Newsletter Reminder #4
content:
You are receiving this because you did not unsubscribe from our previous three reminders.
Next reminder scheduled automatically.

title: High SLA needed!
content: We are a fast-growing startup disrupting the pet food industry and need a dedicated server ASAP. Downtime is NOT an option.

title: FINAL WARNING
content:
Your email account has been selected for mandatory verification. Failure to respond within 24 hours will result in account suspension.

Kind regards,
Totally Real Support Team

title: Cheap Compute
content:
Hello,
we are looking for the cheapest possible dedicated machine. Noise, redundancy and support are irrelevant.

title: You WON!!!
content:
Congratulations! You have been randomly selected to win a brand new UltraHD Smart Fridge.
To claim your prize, simply reply with your full name, address, and a small processing fee.

title: Research Project
content: We require a reliable dedicated server for data analysis related to a publicly funded research project.

title: Crypto Opportunity
content:
Mine crypto from HOME with guaranteed profits!!! All you need is electricity, internet, and blind faith.
Act now, before regulations catch up!
